languages.text: "Воистину, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Грядут темные времена, и грешники падают в объятия ереси со все большей легкостью. Не только на Футфоле, но и в иных местах расцветают ее дурные цветы. Со многих планет доносятся тревожные вести. Дурное шепчут о творящемся на Кьяве Гамма. А недавно из владений Винтерскейлов на станцию прибыл транспорт "Навиика", переполненный беженцами. Их мир охватила богохульная крамола, и сила ее была столь велика, что пришлось им спасаться бегством".

"Indeed. Dark times are upon us, and wretched souls grow ever more eager to embrace heresy. Both on Footfall and elsewhere, its foul buds are coming into bloom. Troubling news is arriving from many planets. There are whispers of wicked things taking place on Kiava Gamma. And just recently, a transport ship by the name of Naviica, teeming with refugees, arrived on Footfall from Winterscale's Realm. Their world was stricken with blasphemous sedition, and such was its severity that they had to flee to save themselves."
languages.original_text: "Воистину, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Грядут темные времена, и грешники падают в объятия ереси со все большей легкостью. Не только на Футфоле, но и в иных местах расцветают ее дурные цветы. Со многих планет доносятся тревожные вести. Дурное шепчут о творящемся на Кьяве Гамма. А недавно из владений Винтерскейлов на станцию прибыл транспорт "Навиика", переполненный беженцами. Их мир охватила богохульная крамола, и сила ее была столь велика, что пришлось им спасаться бегством".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, my {mf|son|daughter}. Dark times are upon us, and sinners grow ever more eager to embrace heresy. Both on Footfall and elsewhere, its foul blossoms are coming into bloom. Troubling news are arriving from many planets. There are whispers of wicked things taking place on Kiava Gamma. And just recently, a transport ship by the name of Naviica, teeming with refugees, arrived on Footfall from Winterscale's Realm. Their world was stricken with blasphemous sedition, and such was its severity that they had to flee to save themselves."

languages.text: “确实如此，黑暗的时代已经到来，邪恶之人越来越渴望接纳异端邪说。无论是在落脚港，还是在别的地方，它那肮脏的花蕾正在绽放。许多行星都传来了令人不安的消息。有传言说，基亚瓦伽马星上爆发了邪恶的动荡。而就在最近，一艘名叫‘纳维卡号’的运输船满载难民，从温特斯凯尔星区来到了落脚港。他们的世界爆发了亵渎性的叛乱，情况极其严重，他们不得不为了逃命而背井离乡。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Dark times are upon us, and wretched souls grow ever more eager to embrace heresy. Both on Footfall and elsewhere, its foul buds are coming into bloom. Troubling news is arriving from many planets. There are whispers of wicked things taking place on Kiava Gamma. And just recently, a transport ship by the name of Naviica, teeming with refugees, arrived on Footfall from Winterscale's Realm. Their world was stricken with blasphemous sedition, and such was its severity that they had to flee to save themselves."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}。黑暗的时代已经到来，罪人越来越渴望接纳异端邪说。无论是在落脚港，还是在别的地方，它那肮脏的花蕾正在绽放。许多行星都传来了令人不安的消息。有传言说，基亚瓦伽马星上爆发了邪恶的动荡。而就在最近，一艘名叫‘纳维卡号’的运输船满载难民，从温特斯凯尔星区来到了落脚港。他们的世界爆发了亵渎性的叛乱，情况极其严重，他们不得不为了逃命而背井离乡。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Así es. Se acercan tiempos oscuros; las almas retorcidas cada vez se sienten más tentadas a rendirse a la herejía. No solo en Paso: en todos los mundos florecen sus semillas corruptas. Llegan noticias preocupantes de muchos planetas. Incluso se dice que en Kiava Gamma están ocurriendo acontecimientos atroces. Por otro lado, hace poco llegó a Paso una nave de cargamento procedente de los dominios de Winterscale repleta de refugiados bajo el nombre de Naviica. Su mundo había recibido tal azote de blasfemia que se vieron obligados a huir para salvarse».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Dark times are upon us, and wretched souls grow ever more eager to embrace heresy. Both on Footfall and elsewhere, its foul buds are coming into bloom. Troubling news is arriving from many planets. There are whispers of wicked things taking place on Kiava Gamma. And just recently, a transport ship by the name of Naviica, teeming with refugees, arrived on Footfall from Winterscale's Realm. Their world was stricken with blasphemous sedition, and such was its severity that they had to flee to save themselves."

traits.locale_text: «Así es, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}. Se acercan tiempos oscuros; los pecadores cada vez se sienten más tentados a rendirse a la herejía. No solo en Paso: en todos los mundos florecen sus semillas corruptas. Llegan noticias preocupantes de muchos planetas. Incluso se dice que en Kiava Gamma están ocurriendo acontecimientos atroces. Por otro lado, hace poco llegó a Paso una nave de cargamento procedente de los dominios de Winterscale repleta de refugiados bajo el nombre de Naviica. Su mundo había recibido tal azote de blasfemia que se vieron obligados a huir para salvarse».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「まさにそうです。暗黒の時代が到来し、哀れな魂はますます異端を受け入れようと躍起になっている。フットフォールでも他の地域でも、奴らの邪悪な芽が開花しつつあるのです。多くの惑星から懸念すべき報告が入ってきています。キアヴァ・ガンマでは邪悪な何かがうごめいていると噂されています。そしてつい最近、難民で溢れかえったナヴィーカ号という名の輸送船がウィンタースケールの領域からフットフォールに到着しました。彼らの星域は冒涜的な反乱に見舞われ、あまりにも熾烈であったため自分たちを救うために逃げなければならないほどだったそうです」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Dark times are upon us, and wretched souls grow ever more eager to embrace heresy. Both on Footfall and elsewhere, its foul buds are coming into bloom. Troubling news is arriving from many planets. There are whispers of wicked things taking place on Kiava Gamma. And just recently, a transport ship by the name of Naviica, teeming with refugees, arrived on Footfall from Winterscale's Realm. Their world was stricken with blasphemous sedition, and such was its severity that they had to flee to save themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「まさにそうです。暗黒の時代が到来し、罪人たちはますます異端を受け入れようと躍起になっている。フットフォールでも他の地域でも、奴らの邪悪な芽が開花しつつあるのです。多くの惑星から懸念すべき報告が入ってきています。キアヴァ・ガンマでは邪悪な何かがうごめいていると噂されています。そしてつい最近、難民で溢れかえったナビイカ号という名の輸送船がウィンタースケールの領域からフットフォールに到着しました。彼らの星域は冒涜的な反乱に見舞われ、あまりにも熾烈であったため自分たちを救うために逃げなければならないほどだったそうです」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "In der Tat. Uns stehen dunkle Zeiten bevor, und sündhafte Seelen fühlen sich immer mehr zur Ketzerei hingezogen. Auf Footfall wie auch anderswo erblühen ihre faulen Knospen. Von vielen Planeten erreichen uns beunruhigende Nachrichten. Man munkelt von üblen Vorgängen auf Kiava Gamma. Und erst kürzlich traf ein Transportschiff namens Naviica, randvoll mit Flüchtlingen aus dem Winterzunder-Reich, auf Footfall ein. Auf ihrer Welt ist ein blasphemischer Aufstand ausgebrochen, so umfassend, dass sie fliehen mussten, um sich zu retten."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Dark times are upon us, and wretched souls grow ever more eager to embrace heresy. Both on Footfall and elsewhere, its foul buds are coming into bloom. Troubling news is arriving from many planets. There are whispers of wicked things taking place on Kiava Gamma. And just recently, a transport ship by the name of Naviica, teeming with refugees, arrived on Footfall from Winterscale's Realm. Their world was stricken with blasphemous sedition, and such was its severity that they had to flee to save themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Wohl wahr, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}. Uns stehen dunkle Zeiten bevor, und die Sünder fühlen sich immer mehr zur Ketzerei hingezogen. Auf Footfall wie auch anderswo erblühen ihre faulen Knospen. Von vielen Planeten erreichen uns beunruhigende Nachrichten. Man munkelt von üblen Vorgängen auf Kiava Gamma. Und erst kürzlich traf ein Transportschiff namens Naviica, randvoll mit Flüchtlingen aus dem Winterzunder-Reich, auf Footfall ein. Auf ihrer Welt ist ein blasphemischer Aufstand ausgebrochen, so umfassend, dass sie fliehen mussten, um sich zu retten."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « En effet. Une ère de ténèbres nous guette, et les âmes en perdition sont plus désireuses que jamais de basculer dans l'hérésie. Aussi bien à Castel qu'ailleurs, ses bourgeons infâmes sont sur le point d'éclore. Nous recevons des nouvelles inquiétantes de nombreuses planètes. On raconte que des choses maléfiques se trament sur Kiava Gamma. Et il y a quelques jours à peine, un vaisseau de transport grouillant de réfugiés, le Naviica, est arrivé à Castel du royaume de Winterscale. Leur monde a été victime d'une insurrection sacrilège si effroyable que ces gens ont dû fuir pour sauver leurs vies. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Dark times are upon us, and wretched souls grow ever more eager to embrace heresy. Both on Footfall and elsewhere, its foul buds are coming into bloom. Troubling news is arriving from many planets. There are whispers of wicked things taking place on Kiava Gamma. And just recently, a transport ship by the name of Naviica, teeming with refugees, arrived on Footfall from Winterscale's Realm. Their world was stricken with blasphemous sedition, and such was its severity that they had to flee to save themselves."

traits.locale_text: « En effet, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}. Une ère de ténèbres nous guette, et les pécheurs sont plus désireux que jamais de basculer dans l'hérésie. Aussi bien à Castel qu'ailleurs, ses bourgeons infâmes sont sur le point d'éclore. Nous recevons des nouvelles inquiétantes de nombreuses planètes. On raconte que des choses maléfiques se trament sur Kiava Gamma. Et il y a quelques jours à peine, un vaisseau de transport grouillant de réfugiés, le Naviica, est arrivé à Castel du Royaume de Winterscale. Leur monde a été victime d'une insurrection sacrilège si effroyable que ces gens ont dû fuir pour sauver leurs vies. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Öyle. Karanlık zamanlardan geçiyoruz. Sefil ruhlar, kâfirliği benimsemeye her zamankinden daha hevesli. Binliman içinde de dışında da kötücül tohumlar filizlenmeye başladı. Birçok gezegenden kara haberler geliyor. Kiava Gama'da menfur bir şeylerin vuku bulduğuna dair fısıltılar var. Daha geçen gün Naviica isimli, mülteci dolu bir nakliye gemisi Winterscale Diyarı'ndan Binliman'a geldi. Dünyaları kâfirce fitnelere tutulmuş ve etkisi o denli şiddetliymiş ki kendilerini kurtarmak için kaçmaları gerekmiş."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Dark times are upon us, and wretched souls grow ever more eager to embrace heresy. Both on Footfall and elsewhere, its foul buds are coming into bloom. Troubling news is arriving from many planets. There are whispers of wicked things taking place on Kiava Gamma. And just recently, a transport ship by the name of Naviica, teeming with refugees, arrived on Footfall from Winterscale's Realm. Their world was stricken with blasphemous sedition, and such was its severity that they had to flee to save themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle. Karanlık zamanlardan geçiyoruz ve sefil ruhlar kâfirliğe tutunmak konusunda her zamankinden daha istekli. Binliman'da da, herhangi başka bir yerde de kötücül tohumlar giderek filizleniyor. Birçok gezegenden kara haberler geliyor. Kiava Gama'da menfur bir şeylerin meydana geldiğine dair fısıltılar var. Yakın zamanda da Naviica isimli, sığınmacı dolu bir nakliye gemisi Winterscale'in Düzlemi'nden Binliman'a geldi. Dünyaları kâfirce isyanlarla sarmalanmış ve o kadar şiddetlilermiş ki kendilerini kurtarmak için kaçmaları gerekmiş."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
